LanguageData.Deeprim.NoPowerDesc: Allows digging deep into the planet for exploration and mining. Requires a miner.
LanguageData.Deeprim.PowerDesc: Allows digging deep into the planet for exploration and mining. Requires power.
LanguageData.Deeprim.Lowtech.Tooltip: Changes the drill to use manually without power and changes the construction cost. This will convert any built drill to the selected tech-level when changed.
LanguageData.Deeprim.LowtechInfo.Enabled: Low-tech drills enabled, cannot change with active game
LanguageData.Deeprim.LowtechInfo.Disabled: Low-tech drills disabled, cannot change with active game
LanguageData.Deeprim.LowtechInfo.Tooltip: This option can not be changed while a game is active. Save and return to the main menu to be able to change this option. Upon loading drills will convert to the selected tech-level.
LanguageData.Deeprim.NoMoreShafts: You cannot place more than one shaft. You can hold SHIFT while placing to override this. NOTE: The mod is not designed to have more than one shaft, placing this may have unintended consequences!
LanguageData.Deeprim.GeneratingMap: Drilling is complete, generating new map. This may take a while depending on the map-size used.
LanguageData.Deeprim.DecreasePowerTT: Lowers the extra power transferred to lower layers to {0}W. This is not counting the 1000W transferred when the drill is not currently drilling. Power is split equal between connected layers.
LanguageData.Deeprim.IncreasePowerTT: Increases the extra power transferred to lower layers to {0}W. This is not counting the 1000W transferred when the drill is not currently drilling. Power is split equal between connected layers.
LanguageData.Deeprim.SendDownTT: Send everything on the elevator down to the layer at {0}m. Hold CTRL to also switch map to that layer.
LanguageData.Deeprim.BringUpTT: Bring everything on the elevator up to the surface. Hold CTRL to also switch map to the surface layer.
LanguageData.Deeprim.BringUpTopTT: Bring everything on the elevator from the layer at {0}m up to the surface.
LanguageData.Deeprim.ConfirmAbandonAgain: Click again to confirm. Once abandoned, everything in that layer is lost forever!
LanguageData.Deeprim.ConfirmAbandonTT: This action is irreversible!!! If this is the only shaft to it, everything currently on that layer shall be lost forever, without any way of getting them back.
LanguageData.Deeprim.AbandonAll: You are about to deconstruct the main shaft. All layers and anything in them will be abandoned permanently. There is no way back from this. Are you sure you want to continue with the deconstruction?
LanguageData.Deeprim.AbandonTT: Abandon the layer. If there's no more shafts connected to it, all pawns and items in it is lost forever.
LanguageData.Deeprim.PauseDrillingTT: Temporary pause drilling. Progress are kept.
LanguageData.Deeprim.StartDrillingNewTT: Start drilling down to find a new suitable mining area.
LanguageData.Deeprim.StartDrillingExistingTT: Start drilling down towards existing mining area.
LanguageData.Deeprim.ChangeTransferTargetTT: Toggle target for nearby storage. Currently, transfer is set to depth: {0}m
LanguageData.Deeprim.ChangeTargetNewTT: Toggle target between new layer and old layers. Currently, mining shaft is set to dig new layer.
LanguageData.Deeprim.ChangeTargetExistingTT: Toggle target between new layer and old layers. Currently, mining shaft is set to old layer, depth: {0}m
